JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish speaking Content Moderator, Berlin, Germany
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Work International, Stockholm, Sweden, is looking for a Danish speaking Content Moderator, Berlin, Germany.

Live the vibrant city life while advancing your career in Berlin!

Picture yourself living and working in Berlin, a city where history, art, and innovation seamlessly come together. Known for its vibrant cultural scene, world-renowned nightlife, and inclusive, diverse community, Berlin offers endless opportunities. Moreover, it’s a city for career growth and unforgettable experiences!

If you’re passionate about social media and eager to help create safer digital spaces, this is the perfect opportunity for you! Based in Berlin, you’ll work at the crossroads of technology and community, ensuring meaningful change in the online world. Therefore, why not take the next step in your career while making a real impact?
Join our dynamic Danish Content Moderator team in Berlin and advance your career in this thriving international hub!

Job description

As a Danish Content Moderator in Berlin, you will play a key role in maintaining the quality and integrity of social media platforms. Your main responsibility will be to review posts, ensuring they align with community guidelines while fostering a positive and engaging user experience.

Together with Danish colleagues and experts across 14 international markets, you will collaborate to make a significant impact to a safer and more enjoyable digital space for millions of users worldwide!

Your Responsibilities as a Danish Content Moderator:
  • Assess and respond to user-reported content that may be offensive or disturbing, following client policies and guidelines.
  • Review, block, and delete content that violates community standards.
  • Deliver high-quality work with attention to detail.
  • Directly contribute to reducing hate, racism, bullying, cybercrimes, and misinformation online.


What’s in it for you?
  • Relocation bonus: Support with moving to Berlin and €1.000 relocation bonus!
  • Shift Bonuses: Earn extra pay—40% for Sundays/public holidays and 50% for night shifts.
  • Monthly Salary & Performance Incentives: Base salary of 2,583€ (40 hrs/week) plus up to 150€ in performance rewards.
  • Career Growth: High potential for advancement—over 90% of the company’s promotions are internal!
  • Supportive Culture & Modern Workspace: Join a diverse team with 60+ nationalities, wellness programs, and team events, all in a fully equipped office with relaxation zones, gaming areas, and ergonomic setups!
  • Opportunity for Positive Impact: Help make Social Media a safer place for all users.


What we are looking for:
  • Language Skills: Very good level of Danish and English—no German required.
  • Cultural Awareness: Strong understanding of social and cultural issues in the Netherlands and surrounding regions.
  • Adaptability: Open to dynamic priorities and processes in a fast-paced international team.
  • Flexibility: Ability to work rotating shifts (24/7).
  • Eligibility: EU citizenship or valid German work permit, and a clean certificate of conduct.


Why Berlin?

Germany offers the unique blend of rich history, creativity, and vibrant culture, with Berlin being the ultimate city to experience it all! The city is known for its dynamic arts scene, historical landmarks, and thriving tech industry. Living and working as a Danish Content Moderator in Berlin guarantees a high quality of life, affordable housing and excellent public transportation. In addition, this city is a diverse and international community, so if you’re seeking career growth and a multicultural environment – Berlin is undoubtedly the ideal choice when moving abroad!

Why work for our client?

Our client is a global leader in customer experience and business process outsourcing, operating in 88 countries with a team of over 420,000 employees. With a strong commitment to creating a motivating and people-focused environment, our client prioritize personal growth, collaboration, and excellence. This is a great opportunity to join an organization that puts people at the heart of everything they do, fostering both professional success and job satisfaction!

Ready to start your career as a Danish Content Moderator in Berlin? Apply today – even if you don’t meet every requirement, we’re looking forward to connect.

Read more about the vacancy and apply online:

https://www.workinternational.com/job/work-as-a-danish-speaking-content-moderator-in-berlin/
